title: Football Manager 2024 (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Start building your dream world-class football team today! Score Football Manager 2024 for free via Epic Games Store and step into the shoes of a real boss, managing the world’s best teams and writing your own football story.
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

title: Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts (Epic Games) Giveaway
description: Grab your sniper scope and take aim at this unbeatable giveaway! Claim Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts for free on Epic Games Store! Sniper Ghost Warrior Contracts is a Sniper game with a single-player campaign  and open-ended maps. Check it out!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Login into your Epic Games Store account.
3. Click the button to add the game to your library

title: Divine Knockout Serious Business Hercules Skin Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Divine Knockout Skin Key and unlock the Serious Business Skin for Hercules! Please note the base game Divine Knockout (free-to-play) is required to enjoy this add-on content.
instructions:
1. Log in or register to your free Alienware Arena account.
2. Click the button to unlock your key and follow the giveaway instructions.
